h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte
content: Head back to the bridge where you fought the Tiger’s Acolyte, and cross to the far side. You’ll enter a large cave here, and a few Swift Bats will appear to harass you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windrest Hamlet' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte'.
The content is as follows:
Head back to the bridge where you fought the Tiger’s Acolyte, and cross to the far side. You’ll enter a large cave here, and a few Swift Bats will appear to harass you.
